alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 10:51PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN THOMAS COUNTY THROUGH 1115 PM CDT... At 1050 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Levant, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Colby around 1105 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 42 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Kansas.
